div.h3: Reviews created for torress for sprint Derry 2
div.p: This gives a way to access review timelines, see revisions, see files, see comments, apply/reference key word indicators.

tr.td: FAB-5976: Updated naming for clarification
FAB-5250 Error opening the Intake opening document from the activity feed
FAB-1987 Dont call Eligibility exceptions if the DTO doesnt have the data to fill

FAB-3631: Fixed lost of context of the more tabs option in a tab strip.
FAB-6261 Check background data clears on intake and add time if you change reason and / or relationships
FDP-4626 New instances in language domain (134)
FAB-6274 Selenium Test for Paper Intake (\'happy path\')
FAB-6351: Create label for Complete Details
FAB-5573 Misspelled \'Qualifier 2\' in all environments, including the \'Clean\' environment

FAB-6345: Refresh on paper intake page after selecting the Absence Reason
FAB-6376 Merge changes that were made post-8.4 official merge
FAB-5540: Some minor changes: ava 8 support for runnin sonar integration, condition to stop the pipeline if junit/integrationTets have any error.
FAB-360: fix sonar critical rule
FAB-000: fix test

FAB-6428: Validation error message doesn\'t disappear after changing the Absence Reason

FAB-6448 Render quick Notifier fields
FAB-6440 BO changes
